item.description:
★★ FRI April 26 *TEN AND COUNTING with The Connecticut Theatre Group★★

Your Ticket includes the Connecticut Theatre Group FREE Wine and Cheese Pre-Party at 7:30pm, the TEN AND COUNTING show in the Connecticut Theatre Group Section at 8pm, and Afterparty following the show

ALL CONNECTICUT THEATRE GROUP TICKET HOLDERS WILL BE EMAILED PRE-PARTY AND AFTERPARTY INFO

TEN...AND COUNTING- STOP/TIME DANCE THEATER

Celebrate STOP/TIME DANCE THEATER's10th Anniversary as they dance their way through a decade of entertainment. Flash back to some of the group's favorite numbers then flash forward to see what's in store for the future.  A fun-filled show from start to finish!


"Enjoy them, and then dance your way home." - Gil Gigliotti, CT Wit review

Playhouse on Park
244 Park Road
West Hartford, CT 06119
Next to AC Petersons
FREE SAFE PARKING

From I-84, east or west, take Exit 43 Park Road. At the end of the ramp, turn right. We are approximately one half mile on the left.  From West Hartford Center, take South Main Street to Park Road and turn left. We are approximately 1 mile on the left.

Advance Ticket Discount - only $25
Tickets are $32.50 at the show

Your Ticket includes the Connecticut Theatre Group FREE Wine and Cheese Pre-Party at 7:30pm, the TEN AND COUNTING show in the Connecticut Theatre Group Section at 8pm, and Afterparty following the show

THIS EVENT WILL SELL OUT - GET YOUR TICKET NOW

Visit http://www.CTTheatre.org or call (860) 987-7888
item.how_to_find_us: Pick up your tickets from The Connecticut Theatre Group at the FREE Wine and Cheese Pre-Party starting at 7:30pm, or at the ticket window after 8pm

group.name: Connecticut Theatre Group Arts-Theater Events Group Discount

item.name: FRI April 26 *TEN AND COUNTING with Connecticut Theatre Group + Pre & Afterparty
